options.name: id
options.description:
Id used for the modal. If not set it will be auto-generated. To show modal from anywhere in the application use $broadcast('show-modal', 'id') event.
$broadcast('hide-modal', 'id') hides it.
Thanks to event system you can have multiple modal instances on the same page.

options.name: fade
options.description: If set to true modal will fade in on open and fade out on close.
